lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: John Baca
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: During a night ambush patrol, he threw himself on an enemy grenade to shield fellow soldiers, surviving the blast.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Donald E. Ballard
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: In 1968, treated wounded Marines under fire and covered a grenade with his body before it failed to detonate, then continued medical care.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Dwight W. Birdwell
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: Defended his unitâ€™s position under heavy enemy fire, manning exposed weapons and covering the evacuation of wounded personnel.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Frederick E. Ferguson
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: Flew a helicopter repeatedly into intense enemy fire to evacuate wounded troops from a besieged outpost.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: James P. Fleming
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: Piloted a helicopter into a small clearing under fire to rescue a surrounded Special Forces team, narrowly avoiding a crash.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Harold A. Fritz
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: Led a small armored convoy ambushed by a much larger enemy force, reorganizing survivors and leading a breakout while wounded.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Allan J. Kellogg Jr.
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: Smothered an enemy grenade with his body to save fellow Marines, surviving with severe injuries.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Allen J. Lynch
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: Rescued three wounded soldiers under heavy fire, then stayed behind to protect them and repel enemy attacks.

lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.name: Gary B. Beikirch
lesser_known_living_medal_of_honor_recip.notable_action: As a Special Forces medic, repeatedly crossed open ground under intense fire to treat and evacuate wounded Montagnard and US troops.
